data.name: Victim of Night
data.oracle_text: Destroy target non-Vampire, non-Werewolf, non-Zombie creature.
data.flavor_text:
"Do not touch a drop. Not yet. I want to watch this so-called slayer's last crisis of faith."
—Olivia Voldaren

data.name: Vindicate
data.flavor_text:
"Don't mourn for me. This is my destiny."
—Gerrard

data.name: Vindicate
data.flavor_text:
"I have seen entire civilizations rise and fall. You mortals are but dust to me."
—Sorin Markov

data.name: Vindicate
data.flavor_text: Some convictions are so strong that the world must break to accommodate them.

data.name: Violet Pall
data.oracle_text: Destroy target nonblack creature. Create a 1/1 black Faerie Rogue creature token with flying.
data.flavor_text: A faerie is the offspring of Oona and mischief.

data.name: Vraska's Stoneglare
data.oracle_text: Destroy target creature. You gain life equal to its toughness. You may search your library and/or graveyard for a card named Vraska, Regal Gorgon, reveal it, and put it into your hand. If you search your library this way, shuffle.

data.name: Walk the Plank
data.flavor_text: When Captain Thorn adds a new ship to his fleet, he gives the crew a simple choice: follow me, or fall in the sea.

data.name: Wallop
data.oracle_text: Destroy target blue or black creature with flying.
data.flavor_text: In Yavimaya, flying low to join a battle can be a costly mistake.

data.name: Weed Strangle
data.oracle_text: Destroy target creature. Clash with an opponent. If you win, you gain life equal to that creature's toughness. (Each clashing player reveals the top card of their library, then puts that card on the top or bottom. A player wins if their card had a higher mana value.)

data.name: Wing Snare
data.flavor_text: The elves long ago mastered the art of hunting with nets. They call it "fishing the sky."

data.name: Wing Snare
data.flavor_text:
"Argoth's doom rained from a clear sky. Yavimaya will not share that fate."
—Multani, maro-sorcerer

data.name: Winnow
data.oracle_text:
Destroy target nonland permanent if another permanent with the same name is on the battlefield.
Draw a card.

data.name: Witherbloom Command
data.oracle_text:
Choose two —
• Target player mills three cards, then you return a land card from your graveyard to your hand.
• Destroy target noncreature, nonland permanent with mana value 2 or less.
• Target creature gets -3/-1 until end of turn.
• Target opponent loses 2 life and you gain 2 life.

data.name: Wrecking Ball
data.flavor_text: Rakdos festivals almost leave enough rubble in their wake to hide the bodies.

data.name: Wretched Banquet
data.oracle_text: Destroy target creature if it has the least power or is tied for least power among creatures on the battlefield.
data.flavor_text:
"The meek inherit nothing."
—Sedris, the Traitor King

data.name: You Are Already Dead
data.oracle_text:
Destroy target creature that was dealt damage this turn.
Draw a card.
data.flavor_text: So swift and sharp was his blade that the ogre never even felt the cut.
